net.metarelate.terminology.coreModel
Interface CacheManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
CacheManagerTDBImpl
public interface CacheManager

Provides some caching functionalities

Author:
andrea_splendiani

Method Summary
 void changeValue(java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String property, java.lang.String value)
          Removes all literal values having the specified resources and property, then introduces one new statement having the specified value as a literal
 boolean cleanValueFor(java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String property)
          Remove all statements having the specified resource and property and a literal as an object
 void forceCleanProp(java.lang.String propertyURI)
          Removes all statements having the specified property (Any subject or Object).
 java.lang.String getSubjectForValue(java.lang.String urlRequested, java.lang.String property)
          Returns the subject of a statement having the specified property and resource as an object.
 java.lang.String getValueFor(java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String property)
          Returns a value for a resource/property pair.
 void recordValue(java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String property, java.lang.String value)
          Records a statement
 void synch()
          Issue a synch to the cache persistence layer (depends on the implementation)
 

Method Detail

getValueFor

java.lang.String getValueFor(java.lang.String resource,
                             java.lang.String property)
Returns a value for a resource/property pair. A random value is returned if more than one is present.

cleanValueFor

boolean cleanValueFor(java.lang.String resource,
                      java.lang.String property)
Remove all statements having the specified resource and property and a literal as an object

recordValue

void recordValue(java.lang.String resource,
                 java.lang.String property,
                 java.lang.String value)
Records a statement

Parameters:
resource - the URI of the resource
property - the URI of the property
value - a literal value

changeValue

void changeValue(java.lang.String resource,
                 java.lang.String property,
                 java.lang.String value)
Removes all literal values having the specified resources and property, then introduces one new statement having the specified value as a literal

Parameters:
value - a literal value

forceCleanProp

void forceCleanProp(java.lang.String propertyURI)
Removes all statements having the specified property (Any subject or Object).

synch

void synch()
Issue a synch to the cache persistence layer (depends on the implementation)

getSubjectForValue

java.lang.String getSubjectForValue(java.lang.String urlRequested,
                                    java.lang.String property)
Returns the subject of a statement having the specified property and resource as an object. If more than one statement is found, one random subjct is returned.

Parameters:
urlRequested - The URI object of a statement
property - The property of statement
Returns:
the URI subject of the statement
